comments.body:
Add `@param` documentation with an explanation of `parallelism`.
Add `@tparam` for `State`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +47,51 @@   *                 * to track number of retries
   *                 * to store request to be issued in the case of retry
   */
  def tryFlow[In <: DynamoDbRequest, Out <: DynamoDbResponse, State](
      parallelism: Int
